job_title: Global Marketing Analytics, Data Visualization Analyst
job_description:
• Develop and maintain marketing data visualizations and dashboards to help the marketing team make impactful decisions and understand the overall health of their businessCollaborate with cross-functional teams, including marketing teams, data scientists, and IT professionals, to gather requirements and translate them into effective visualizations.
• Proficiency in Tableau desktop, Tableau prep (complex calculations, parameters, and LOD expressions as well as data preparation, blending, and aggregation)Advanced SQL skills: Proficient in writing complex SQL queries to extract, manipulate, and analyze dataFamiliarity with data modeling tools, collaborative environments, and version controlStrong problem-solving skills and the ability to communicate complex data insights visually.
• Strong interpersonal skillsDetail-oriented with strong time management skillsAbility to work independently while prioritizing multiple projects and tasksFamiliarity with Enterprise sales and marketing practices in a B2B environment nice to haveFamiliarity with marketing practices, marketing KPIs, marketing analytics is a plusExperience with Salesforce products nice to haveA portfolio showcasing previous data visualization and marketing analytics projects is advantageous Life at Salesforce Our Locations Our Locations North America Europe, Middle East, and Africa Asia Pacific Latin America Our Teams Our Teams Sales Technology & Product Customer Success Corporate Roles AI Research University University Overview Interns New Grads Advanced Degrees Associate Program Manager Talent Programs Talent Programs Overview Future Pathways India Return to Work Military Fellows Our Story Newsroom Blog Careers Trust Salesforce.
• Org Sustainability Investors Give us your Feedback Sitemap Legal Terms of Service Privacy Information Responsible Disclosure Trust Contact Manage Preferences Experience will be evaluated based on alignment to the Values & Behaviors for the role (e.
• Extracurricular leadership roles, military experience, volunteer work, etc.
• Proven experience (2+ years) in data visualization University Overview Interns New Grads Advanced Degrees Associate Program Manager.
• Utilize Tableau and other relevant tools to create datasets that power effective marketing dashboards, reports, and presentations.
• Develop and maintain a library of reusable data visualization components, ensuring data accuracy and integrity in visualization projects.
